name: Evripidis Xenakis
story: Evripidis was born and raised in Greece. He joined the army at a young age, hoping to serve his country and make a better life for himself. During his training, he proved himself to be a skilled marksman and was selected to be a rifleman. His bravery and discipline have earned him the respect of his fellow soldiers, and he is proud to serve as a member of the INDEPENDENT faction.
